name: Kaia Potal
description: Comprehensive platform that simplifies your blockchain experience by offering features such as token swaps, cross-chain bridges, and staking opportunities. It also provides missions and rewards to enhance user engagement.

name: Capybara
description: Capybara DEX is a decentralized exchange on the Kaia chain, offering efficient token trading with features like single-token liquidity pools and a launchpad for new projects.

name: Lair Finance
description: Lair Finance is a decentralized liquid staking platform on the Kaia blockchain, letting users stake KAIA tokens and earn rewards with added liquidity.

name: 1inch
description: The 1inch Network unites decentralized protocols whose synergy enables the most lucrative, fastest and protected operations in the DeFi space.

name: Swapscanner
description: Swapscanner aims to be a one-stop platform for the Klaytn ecosystem. Starting as a next-generation DEX aggregator, we are providing services such as Pro chart and Wallet sequentially.

name: Kaia Fun
description: KaiaFun is a memecoin launchpad on the Kaia blockchain, enabling fair-launch memecoins and supporting the DeFi ecosystem with trading liquidity.

name: Kaia Square
description: Kaia Square is the governance hub for the Kaia blockchain, where users discuss proposals and influence ecosystem decisions.

name: KaiaSwap
description: KaiaSwap is a decentralized exchange on the Kaia blockchain, offering efficient token swaps and liquidity farming through advanced DLAMM technology.

name: DragonSwap
description: DragonSwap is a decentralized exchange on Klaytn and Dragon Chain, offering token swaps, liquidity provision, and low-fee transactions..
